channel.title: Help? :(
channel.description:
I have a built in ::makesupport and gives them support only thing they can do is ::mute. How do i make it where onc ei make them it, when they yell [player] goes away and just says [server support] when they yell? I tryed adding yells and I pu them names in the yell i made of serversupport now they yell [sserver support] and [player] and i dont have a object list so i need help on how to fix it or re-make it :confused:
skype: oooooraeooooo skype: gary.wieder3

item.title: Help? :(
item.dc:creator: @garywieder03 garywieder03
item.description:
@garywieder03 wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:2, topic:452412”]Post your yell method.[/quote] if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(“NAME GOES HERE”)) {
players.getPackets().sendGameMessage(
“<col=F88017>[Server Support]<img=5><col=ffffff>”
+ player.getDisplayName() + “: <col=F88017>”
+ message + “”);
}

Read full topic
